table.name: vtiger_employees
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_employees` ( `employeesid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_employeescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_employeescf` ( `employeesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`employeesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
